+ importTests
import unittest
import leoTest
reload(leoTest) # Allows us to rerun this script when leoTest.py changes.

suite = leoTest.makeImportExportSuite("importTests","tempNode")
runner = unittest.TextTestRunner()
runner.run(suite)
